QuestData.Title: Better With Age
QuestData.Description: It is a crime to harvest the young trees, but a much bigger crime to waste the amber.$b$bYoung amber is not as strong, but the Klaxxi need it to continue the fight. We will bring them more and they will sing my praises!$b$bGather the young amber. We will store it until it is aged and can be consumed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 7 Amber-Filled Jars from the Amber Collectors on the Stinging Trail.
